Name: Whiskey Squirt
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Top up with Soda from siphon
Instructions: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda from a siphon. Serve with straws.
Review: Peach combines wonderfully with bourbon and this drink benefits from that marriage.
History: Adapted from a recipe purloined from David Embury's classic book, The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks .
Nutrition: One serving of Whiskey Squirt contains 204 calories
